name: Bob et Bobette: Les Dompteurs du Temps
storyline:
The criminal Crimson just escape from prison. Lambique disappear mysteriously after this terrible news.
Bob and Bobette investigate and reach the Professor's lab to find Lambique hat in the time machine.
They accept to travel the time to find Lambique.
summary: Bob et Bobette: Les Dompteurs du Temps is an Action game, developed by Standaard Multimedia and published by Infogrames, which was released in Europe in 2001.
